Posts.Content: njwall wrote: Had Breast Cancer  Dec 1999 (invasive ductal caranoma lump 5 cm) Chemo didn't work had mastectomy in March 2000 Then chemo 4 month then radiation..also have degenerative disc dis.  Been cancer free until now. Have been losing wieht for a yr..onc says cancer want do that sent me to other doc nothing wrong..Then in Sept 2010 go plueral effusion lung was totally flat had to wear drain 41 days then bone scan shows lesions in skull next scan shows lesion at t4 and t-9 thru t12. Mean time lost my job no income now 5000 in debt in medical bills and can't pay nomal bills ...Am I wrong to decide not to go to doc anymore.  I just feel I can't keep mounting up all these bills on top of everything else..  I know my children (who are grow) would be upset but I just am torn.  I just need someone to talk to I guess I feel so alone Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Need a friend njwall mamanmidwife

Posts.Content: Jan 1, 2011 04:02PM njwall wrote: thanks to everyone for all your kind words and advise.  I will try to see if I can get some assistance.  I do not qualify for ssdi I have worked last 3 1/2 yrs but bcause i am 60 need 20 work credits to get ssdi. I was out of work for 7 yrs with cancer then neck surgery and back surgery.Tried to get ssdi then but was tirned down. The company I had worked for then gave me 7 yrs disability.  Then tried going back to work and have gone down hill from there.  Thanks again for the encouraging words I will let u know how it goes.  God Bless.
